TopicTitle: Music and Sound mute on Numkey #1 and #2

Articles.Content:
For lefties like myself, the keypad keys are often critical in gameplay, like ASDW are for right-handed folks. I use them for maneuvering in KSP and KSP2.

In KSP2 (and not KSP1), number keypad 1 & 2 are apparently set as hard-coded toggles for Music and Sound, which is a bit of a hassle when I'm using them during launch, flight, docking, etc, etc.

Is there any chance to add making these toggles bindable to the list of things to change/fix regarding key-binding?
I'd file this as a bug. It muted all my audio as soon as I tried to create a campaign and pressed keypad 1 as part of my agency name. Not a great start.

8 hours ago, GPSnoopy said:

Thanks for chiming in! I'm pretty sure this will be filed...

Just to add on that - this was the first (and only) bug I sent over. For any lefty, the num-table is the best thing for flying including 7 und 9 for roll.

(I dont use 1 for anything, but sound on/off on 2 is simply annoying).

As the key binding in general has a number of bugs, I hope that this could be relatively easy changed through a mod.
